A '''netherite upgrade''' is a type of [[smithing template]] used in [[smithing table]]s to upgrade [[armor]] and [[tool]]s from [[Diamond family|diamond]] to [[netherite]]. It is consumed when used, but can be [[Crafting|duplicated]] using an existing template, [[netherrack]], and diamonds.

== Obtaining ==
This item is found in [[bastion remnant]]s. Once obtained, it can be duplicated with [[diamond]]s and [[netherrack]]. 

=== Generated loot ===
{{LootChestItem|netherite-upgrade-smithing-template}}

== Usage ==
It is an ingredient in its own recipe, making it simple to craft more after the initial item is found.

=== Crafting ingredient ===
{{Crafting
|A1=Diamond |B1=Netherite Upgrade |C1=Diamond
|A2=Diamond |B2=Netherrack |C2=Diamond
|A3=Diamond |B3=Diamond |C3=Diamond
|Output=Netherite Upgrade Smithing Template,2
}}

=== Smithing ingredient ===
While upgrading, the newly crafted netherite gear retains the [[Enchanting|enchantment]]s, [[Anvil mechanics#Prior work penalty|prior work penalty]] and number of [[durability]] points lost (instead of the remaining durability) from the [[diamond]] gear.

Unlike [[anvil]]s, using a [[Smithing Table|smithing table]] to upgrade diamond gear to netherite gear costs no [[experience]] and does not increase the prior work penalty.

Armor retains its existing [[Smithing Template#Variants|trim]], if applied, when upgrading.
